text:
Hello everyone :slightly_smiling_face:

I have a data engineering requirement wherein i want to get the data from my sandbox env to my warehousing destination which is amazon redshift

im trying to achieve that with Amazon Appflow.
As part of this process im trying to follow this process

<https://docs.aws.amazon.com/appflow/latest/userguide/connectors-HubSpot.html>

i am asked to create a developer account and create an app and a test account

my question is here:

What is the mechanism through which i can see this developer account/ app to pull data from the sandbox account, where all my data is stored?
Can someone explain the workings of this process to me?

Hi

I wanted to know that why are we experiencing a high number of connection denials when calling webhooks for task status change events? this was working fine before 2 days and all of sudden its giving error.
Just for info i am using Beta.

can anyone help on this please.
